column2: # Join weather; scale predictors for stability

glm(formula = cbind(success_nests, failed_nests) ~ z_mean_temp + 
    z_max_temp + z_min_temp + z_total_rain + z_max_rain + z_rain_days + 
    z_mean_wind + z_max_wind + z_hail_days + year, family = quasibinomial, 
    data = success_df)
Null deviance: 107.689  on 31  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance:  61.319  on 21  degrees of freedom
